remarks: A join is less than or equal to a third value iff each argument is less than or equal to the third value.  ( ~ chlub analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.)
statement:
latlej.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latlej.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latlej.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latjle12 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .<_ Z /\ Y .<_ Z ) <-> ( X .\/ Y ) .<_ Z ) ) $.
